▶ News: Get the latest news, live football results, players, top scorer standings, best coach, national leagues, European competitions (Premier League, Serie A, Ligue 1 and Bundesliga) and official statements from LaLiga 2022/23. Enjoy the best goals, highlights and news from the world of sport.

▶“Teams” section: Access all the content on your favourite club. Enjoy the latest multimedia content with photos and videos, football results and fixtures.

Download the official app and enjoy all of your favourite teams’ live results, goals and football news.
